rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0001
rows.name:
While I was handing out the food,
I heard the soldiers talking.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently, the repairs on
Lett Bridge still aren't done.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0003
rows.name:
Why is that?
It should have been a while
since we sent out the workers.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, apparently they keep getting
attacked by Occupide Gogols,
so they can't make any progress.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0005
rows.name:
I even sent guards with them.
I guess it wasn't enough.
My mistake.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0006
rows.name:
Are those Occupide Gogols
really that tough?

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0007
rows.name:
They're nothing special individually,
but in a pack, I bet the soldiers
can't handle them.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0008
rows.name:
Apparently, the Occupide Gogols are
what broke the bridge to begin with.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0009
rows.name:
If that bridge is out,
we can't easily get to the capital.
What a pain.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0010
rows.name: What about Hugo and Wadatsumi?

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0011
rows.name:
They're scheduled
to be back in a little while...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0012
rows.name:
Okay, let's go sort this out
before Hugo gets back.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0013
rows.name: Of course! Shin and I will help.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0014
rows.name: Actually, I...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0015
rows.name: Oh? Is there a problem?

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0016
rows.name: No, it's just..

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0017
rows.name:
I already promised I'd make
my specialty dish tomorrow.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0018
rows.name: Don't worry about that!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0019
rows.name:
I'll handle the food,
so you go help Adel-sama!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0020
rows.name: That would be a big help, Shin.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0021
rows.name:
We'll save your cooking for a party
when the bridge is repaired!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0022
rows.name: Alright...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0023
rows.name:
And Hikari-chan, you can really
show off your skills and
make the celebration a real feast!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0024
rows.name: Y-you, keep your hands out of it~!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0025
rows.name: Ah, nothing beats a meal after training.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0029
rows.name: Yeah. I ate so much...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0026
rows.name: Um, Adel-sama...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0027
rows.name: Let's leave tomorrow morning.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0028
rows.name:
You can just make your dish
after we beat the Gogols.
